abstract: Report in local Belgian newspaper La Derniere Heure describes so-called alcohol-fueled orgy at police station in Brussels during time when it was almost totally shut down due to fears of terrorist attack in wake of events in Paris; report adds to mounting criticism of Belgian law enforcement agencies in wake of Paris attacks.
lead_paragraph: A newspaper reported an account of an alcohol-fueled “orgy” among soldiers and officers at a police station last month while Brussels was nearly shut down after the Paris massacre.

headline.main: Brussels Police Investigate Reports of Police Orgy Amid Terror Alert
headline.print_headline: Brussels Investigates Report of Orgy at Police Station During Terror Alert

snippet: A newspaper reported an account of an alcohol-fueled “orgy” among soldiers and officers at a police station last month while Brussels was nearly shut down after the Paris massacre.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
